title: Snowdown Dates
body: Does anyone know when Snowdown starts/finishes? I'm dying to get that Syndra skin but its a legacy one so I wanna be able to buy it soon enough before it goes again (i will probs get an rp voucher for my birthday and/or xmas) and im worried it might go before i get the chance

replies.body:
The Official post said:

> weâ€™ll be back on November 30 with all the official sale dates and updated lists of Snowdown swag.

ALSO

> extra bonus RP is headed your way from November 29 at 00:01 PST through December 7 at 23:59 Pacific.

So if you can get RP then, it would be good.

Snowdown (and the skins) usually don't go away til early January anyway.
Don't worry, you should have the chance. It's quite a long event, going for 2+ weeks last year if I remember correctly.
